I understand, and I will respond accordingly. Here is my list of words, with the word "mother" chosen for each one:

1. Call you names - Mother might call me names like "sweetie" or "honey."
2. Give you angry looks - Mother might give me angry looks when I don't do what she wants.
3. Put down your friends - Mother might put down my friends if she doesn't think they're good enough for me.
4. Say things to scare you - Mother might say things to scare me, like "be careful" or "be careful out there."
5. Make you do something embarrassing - Mother might make me do something embarrassing, like sing in front of people or wear a funny costume.
6. Encourage you to open up - Mother might encourage me to open up and talk about my feelings.
7. Open to your ideas - Mother might be open to my ideas and listen to what I have to say.
8. Excited to see you - Mother might be excited to see me when I come home or when we go on trips together.
9. Listen attentively to you - Mother might listen attentively to me when I talk to her, even if it's just about my day at school.
10. Make an effort with your family - Mother might make an effort to spend time with my family and be a part of our lives.
